title: Stuck at recconect
body: Stuck at recceonct screen after finishing a game .After clicking skip waiting for stats and relogin.

replies.body: Sounds like there's some EU specific problems going on atm. You'd be better off looking to the EU Technicall Support page rather than here on OCE, since our server isn't having the same issue: https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en
Same :) Im so tired of this sh*t company that still can't repair this game
